peripheralPage.name: _instance

intOption.name: rtcclkin_clock
intOption.toolTip: External clock for the RTC (usually 32.768 kHz)

binaryOption.name: rtc_cr_clko
binaryOption.toolTip: Determines if RTC 32kHz Clock is available to peripherals

binaryOption.name: rtc_cr_um
binaryOption.toolTip: Allows the SR[TCE] to be written even when the Status Register is locked.\n When set, the SR[TCE] can always be written if the SR[TIF] or SR[TOF] are set or if the SR[TCE] is clear

choice.name: SR[TCE] cannot be written when locked
SR[TCE] can be written when locked under limited conditions

binaryOption.name: rtc_cr_sup
binaryOption.toolTip: Determines if the RTC register access is available in non-supervisor mode\n Non supported write accesses generate a bus error

binaryOption.name: rtc_cr_wpe
binaryOption.toolTip: Determines if the wakeup pin is asserted on RTC interrupt when powered down\n The wakeup pin is optional and not available on all devices.

intOption.name: rtc_tcr_cir
intOption.toolTip:
Configures the compensation interval in seconds from 1 to 256 to control how frequently the TCR should
 adjust the number of 32.768 kHz cycles in each second. The value written should be one less than the
 number of seconds (for example, write zero to configure for a compensation interval of one second). This
 register is double buffered and writes do not take affect until the end of the current compensation interval.

intOption.name: rtc_tcr_tcr
intOption.toolTip: Adjusts the number of 32.768 kHz clock cycles in each second.\n This value+32768 determines the number of clock cycles that makes up a second

peripheralPage.template:
//! RTC Time Compensation Register
 	static constexpr uint32_t tcr = 	 RTC_TCR_CIR($(rtc_tcr_cir)) | // Compensation Interval Register 	 RTC_TCR_TCR($(rtc_tcr_tcr)); // Time Compensation Register

binaryOption.name: rtc_lr_lrl
binaryOption.toolTip: Once cleared, this bit can only be set by VBAT POR or software reset.

binaryOption.name: rtc_lr_srl
binaryOption.toolTip: Once cleared, this bit can only be set by VBAT POR or software reset.

binaryOption.name: rtc_lr_crl
binaryOption.toolTip: Once cleared, this bit can only be set by VBAT POR or software reset.

binaryOption.name: rtc_lr_tcl
binaryOption.toolTip: Once cleared, this bit can only be set by VBAT POR or software reset.

peripheralPage.template:
//! RTC Lock Register
 	static constexpr uint32_t lr = 	 RTC_LR_LRL($(rtc_lr_lrl)) | // Lock Register Lock 	 RTC_LR_SRL($(rtc_lr_srl)) | // Status Register Lock 	 RTC_LR_CRL($(rtc_lr_crl)) | // Control Register Lock 	 RTC_LR_TCL($(rtc_lr_tcl)); // Time Compensation Lock

/** 	 * Get RTC clock frequency (internal, not masked by RTC_CR_CLKO) 	 * 	 * @return Clock frequency as uint32_t 	 */ 	static uint32_t getInternalClock() { 	 // RTC uses OSC0 EXTAL/XTAL clock 	 return (rtc->CR&RTC_CR_OSCE_MASK)?Osc0Info::osc_clock:0; 	}


	/** 	 * Get RTC clock frequency (external, masked by RTC_CR_CLKO) 	 * 	 * @return Clock frequency as uint32_t 	 */ 	static uint32_t getExternalClock() { 	 return (rtc->CR&RTC_CR_CLKO_MASK)?0:getInternalClock(); 	}
